greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangular array T given by rows: T(n,0)=1 for n >= 0, T(n,1)=1,T(n,2)=2 for n >= 1 and for n >= 2, T(n,k)=T(n-1,k-3)+T(n-1,k-2)+T(n-1,k-1) for 3<=k<=2n-1, T(n,2n)=T(n-1,2n-3)+T(n-1,2n-2).
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
